name: Guatemala City
description: The capital and largest city of Guatemala, known for its bustling markets and rich cultural history.

name: Antigua
description: A beautiful colonial city surrounded by volcanoes, known for its well-preserved Spanish Baroque architecture.

name: Flores
description: A picturesque town located on an island in Lake Petén Itzá, close to the ancient Maya ruins of Tikal.

name: Tikal
description: One of the largest archaeological sites of the Maya civilization, located in the tropical rainforests of northern Guatemala.

name: Livingston
description: A coastal town on the Caribbean, known for its unique Garifuna culture and beautiful beaches.

name: Belize City
description: The largest city in Belize, known as the gateway to the country's many islands and natural attractions.

name: Caye Caulker
description: A small island in the Caribbean Sea, popular for snorkeling, diving, and its laid-back atmosphere.

name: Barrier Reef
description: The Belize Barrier Reef is the second largest coral reef system in the world, home to a rich diversity of marine life.
